pageContext.claim: “But the numbers are still -- if you look at that, the numbers [for destruction in the Bahamas] are still much smaller than anybody would have believed.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false. After the water receded, the Post reported, “nearly three out of every four homes on Grand Bahama are underwater, and the recovery from the catastrophic damage will cost billions of dollars.” Other reports emphasized how shocking this amount of damage was once the waters pulled back.
